import React from 'react' import Linux from '../assets/linux.png' import Docker from '../assets/docker.png' import MySQL from '../assets/mysql.png' import ReactJS from '../assets/react.png' import Node from '../assets/node.png' import Cloudflare from '../assets/cloudflare.png' import GitHub from '../assets/github.png' import MongoDB from '../assets/mongo.png' const Skills = () => { const tech = [ Linux, Docker, MySQL, ReactJS, Node, Cloudflare, GitHub, MongoDB ] return (

Experience

// These are the technologies I have worked with //

{tech.map((item) => (

{item}

))}
) } export default Skills
